attributes.action: Not go to war with Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With hawks and the mass media beating the drums of war with Iran, we the undersigned urge the Government to keep the UK out of war with Iran at any cost, even if it means the souring of UK/US relations.

The reasons for this are simple:
It would be highly unethical.
Our military is stressed to breaking point.
We cannot afford another costly foreign war.
